author: Staff Reporter
text:
A flying squad seized unaccounted cash to the tune of Rs.10.19 lakh from an engineer at Hanumanthai near Marakkanam on Monday night.

The flying squad was conducting vehicle-check near the Hanumanthai check-post when they intercepted a car proceeding from Vadalur to Chennai.

Sivakumar, an engineer from Chennai who was travelling in the car, told the officials that he was proceeding home after a sale transaction at Vadalur. However, he could not produce necessary documents to prove his claim.

The squad seized the cash.
title: Unaccounted cash seized
